CustomField.formula: CASE( StageName , "Onsite Presentation/Demo","Prospect", "Initial Interest","Prospect", "Positve Interest","Prospect", "Proposal/Price Quote","Qualify", "Proposal/Price Quote","Qualify", "Proposal Review","Propose", "Contract Review / Negotiation","Commit", "Contract Review","Commit", "Accepted Price Quote","Commit", "Partial Paperwork","Close", "Ready For Closeout Approval","Close", "Internal Review","Close", "Internal Review - Opportunity Closeout","Close", "Internal Contract Approval","Close", "Internal Review - Price Quote and License","Propose", "Termination of Service Letter Sent","Qualify", "Closed Won","Implement","")
CustomField.label: Sales Funnel Stage
